meta.description: Join GTC as an Partner in the UAE. Earn up to 80% RevShare, offer top bonuses to traders, and grow with a regulated global broker.

payMore.subtitle: A Forex Partnership Programme That
payMore.title: Pays More Than Just Commission
payMore.intro: Welcome to a partnership built for performance. At GTC, we don’t just give you up to 80% RevShare; we give you the tools to grow your business.
payMore.outro: From real trader bonuses to marketing support and instant payouts, this is the FX Partner programme serious partners are switching to.

feature1.title: Earn Up to 80% RevShare
feature1.description: No caps, no limits. Just real payouts you can count on.

feature2.title: Tradeable Bonus for Your Traders
feature2.description: Higher deposits, more volume, more commission for you.

feature3.title: Events & Marketing Tools
feature3.description: We’ll help you attract & convert more traders.

feature4.title: Instant Commission Payouts
feature4.description: Withdraw your partner earnings the moment they hit.

broker.heading:
A Broker You Can
Actually Trust
broker.paragraph: We’re not a fly-by-night operation. GTC is licensed and regulated in multiple respected jurisdictions. Here’s how we give you confidence to trade.

points.p1: Licensed by the UAE’s SCA, Mauritius' FSC, and South Africa's FSCA.
points.p2: Headquartered in Dubai with nearly 1 million global traders.
points.p3: World-class support with a real human touch.
points.p4: Customer-first culture where service is strategy.

broker.bottomTitle: Switch to a broker that doesn’t just say it, we prove it every day.

testimonials.title: What UAE's Partners & Traders Are Saying
testimonials.description: Whether you’re a seasoned partner or just getting started, these partners made the switch and they or their traders haven’t looked back.

t1.text: “As an FX partner, getting up to 80% RevShare and paid out instantly was a game changer. I moved my entire client book to GTC where they’re looked after.”
t1.name: Judi Izdihar Shamoon, Dubai, UAE

t2.text: “I run monthly trading classes in Dubai, UAE. GTC gave me banners, an LP, and real bonuses for my traders. The support is unreal!”
t2.name: Suoud Butrus Gaber, UAE

t3.text: “My trading educator recommended GTC. I was sceptical at first, but now I see why he recommended them. The spreads, bonus, everything just works really well.”
t3.name: Kutaiba Abdul-Matin Awad, UAE

t4.text: “GTC doesn’t just talk, they deliver! I get paid on time, every time, and my traders are sticking around longer than ever. They also trade gold and GTC is great with them.”
t4.name: Yasser Nu'aym Bazzi, UAE

growIB.subtitle: Start Earning More.
growIB.title: Grow Your FX Partnership Business with GTC
growIB.description1: You’ve seen what GTC brings to the table. Now it’s your turn. Join the partnership programme that’s helping UAE’s Forex Partners scale faster, earn more, and build lasting trust with their traders.
growIB.description2: Join us today, and your traders will thank you tomorrow.

footer.riskWarningText: Trading leveraged products such as CFDs involves a high level of risk and may not be suitable for all investors. You could lose more than your initial investment. Please ensure you fully understand the risks and consult an independent advisor if needed.
